cast.name: 查尔斯三世 King Charles III

director.name: 斯图尔特·森德尔 Stuart Sender

this_title: Harmon: A New Way of Looking at Our World
introduction: Inspired by the passion,conviction & guiding principles of HRH The Prince of Wales, Harmony captures the vision of an authentic leader tackling critical global issues -a prince who is not afraid to actually get his hands and feet dirty. For over 3 decades, The Prince of Wales has worked side by side with dynamic environmental activists, business leaders, artists, architects and governmental leaders. From India to Canada to the US to the UK, from boardrooms to organic farms to rain forests , filmmakers Stuart Sender and Julie Bergman Sender capture visionaries transforming the world, making inroads to a more sustainable,spiritual, harmonious relationship with the planet.Harmony is a global call to action offering concrete solutions to meet the challenges of climate change, globally, locally and personally. Written by Anonymous
chinese_title: Harmon: A New Way of Looking at Our World
